desc: Welcome to the official website of Paul Adams Luxury. Discover an exclusive world of original leather bags and style accessories for men and women painted by hand. Shop limited-edition Handbags, Sling Bags, Briefcases, Backpacks, Footwear and more. Handcrafted in soft napa leather, fine-grain leather & ostrich leather.

layout.text: SATCHEL BAG • HANDPAINTED • SOFT NAPA LEATHER
